mapper.select: select id, partyId, orderNo, acctName, acct, acctType, amt, feeRate, srvFee, acAmt, status, crtTime, updTime, respData, memo from ha_withdraw_record where id=#{id}
select id, partyId, orderNo, acctName, acct, acctType, amt, feeRate, srvFee, acAmt, status, crtTime, updTime, respData, memo from ha_withdraw_record where id=#{id} for update
select id, partyId, orderNo, acctName, acct, acctType, amt, feeRate, srvFee, acAmt, status, crtTime, updTime, respData, memo from ha_withdraw_record where orderNo=#{orderNo} for update
mapper.insert: insert into ha_withdraw_record( partyId, orderNo, acctName, acct, acctType, amt, feeRate, srvFee, acAmt, status, crtTime, updTime, respData, memo ) values( #{partyId}, #{orderNo}, #{acctName}, #{acct}, #{acctType}, #{amt}, #{feeRate}, #{srvFee}, #{acAmt}, #{status}, now(), null, #{respData}, #{memo} )
mapper.update: update ha_withdraw_record set status = #{status}, memo = #{memo}, respData = #{respData}, updTime = now() where id = #{id}
